frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-user-stylesheet-font
frozen.shortDescription: Load custom style sheet from ~/.config/gnome-shell/gnome-shell.css. Use GTK font family and font size from GNOME Tweaks in GNOME Shell.
frozen.longDescription: Load custom style sheet from ~/.config/gnome-shell/gnome-shell.css. Use GTK font family and font size from GNOME Tweaks in GNOME Shell.
